name: Arawn's Journey
description:
Arawn's  Journey

Scientists are conducting research that can enable them to make an animal vaccine until all hell breaks loose.

Arawn a famous hunter is asked to eliminate biologically-made lab animals by the city's individuals, the animals roam and kill them after they overpowered the scientists and escaped from the lab.

You as Arawn start your last hunting journey before you retire, are you up for the task? Will you complete the journey?

Here is a gameplay video of the game.
